attributes.action:
Petition To Leave the EU with No Deal.
and abide by the WTO Rules.
attributes.additional_details: The Polititians are being lobbied by big business to voted against the will of the people. The Government need to respect will of the people and uphold democracy. Leave the EU under World Trade Organisation Rules. This will maintain Status Quo for two years. (no panic) The EU need us TEN times more than we need them. let them come to us for a deal, instead of us going to them for a deal. The EU Have stripped Farming. Fishing and heavy industry from this Country. Lets put pride back into Britain.
attributes.background: 17 Million People Voted to Leave the EU in 2016. The ballot paper did not mention "Leave with a Deal" it said Leave the EU. The People were well informed by the PM that this was their one chance and there would not be a second vote if peole wanted to change there minds. it was all legal and binding
